law.catch_line: Limitation on districts' functions, powers and duties.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 147A.050 to 147A.120 shall be deemed to limit or authorize the limitation in any manner of the functions, powers, or duties of any department or agency of the Commonwealth or of any political subdivision. Nor shall anything in KRS 147A.050 to 147A.120 authorize the Finance and Administration Cabinet or an area development district to perform or discharge any powers, duties, or functions now reposed, or which may hereinafter be reposed, by law in the Kentucky Department of Education, local school districts, or other educational institutions.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(4). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 8.
